title: [BUG] MLflow scoring server should return 4xx HTTP status code for bad request data

labels.name: area/scoring
labels.description: MLflow Model server, model deployment tools, Spark UDFs

### Describe the problem

The MLflow scoring server returns a 500 HTTP status code when a bad request is submitted. This happens to servers launched as: 
* `mlflow models serve` 
* `mlflow sagemaker run-local`

The response body contains an error message but the HTTP status code is always 500. The status code should be 400 (BAD REQUEST) which indicates a client error. 5xx codes are reserved for server errors.

### Code to reproduce issue
```
curl  http://localhost:5001/invocations  --verbose \
    -H "Content-Type:application/json" \
    -d ' foo '
```
```
 HTTP/1.1 500 INTERNAL SERVER ERROR
```
